name: Suirx
culture_notes: daily life structured around ritual procurement
diet heavy on preserved fish, kelp, seaweed preserves
constraints: No instant resurrection or true life-replacement magics
Ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents or specialized burg-labors
Navigational auguries exist but cannot replace charts and seamanship
notes: Located at an estuary mouth; seasonal storms and shifting sandbars
Limited arable land; relies on imports and salvaged goods
